content.raw:
We should change to use camel case. 

The current cmake flag manipulation is used because I had more cflag configurations than CMake provided for by default. For example, there are profile and check configurations. The first is for profiling, the second for code coverage (I know, names can be improved here). 

Instead of the above approach we could specify a different build option. However, I don't see the point of changing the functionality.
content.html:
We should change to use camel case.

The current cmake flag manipulation is used because I had more cflag configurations than CMake provided for by default. For example, there are profile and check configurations. The first is for profiling, the second for code coverage (I know, names can be improved here).

Instead of the above approach we could specify a different build option. However, I don't see the point of changing the functionality.
